title: Shaukat Aziz - Former Prime Minister of Pakistan - Chartwell Speakers Bureau

quotes: 16 November 2007, having completed his parliamentary term – becoming the first Prime Minister of Pakistan to do so.
In 2014, Mr. Aziz received an Honorary Doctorate in Business Administration from the East Asia University, Bangkok Thailand.
His son, Abid Aziz, passed away in 2017.

organizations.name: Green Templeton College, Oxford University
quotes: Aziz is a senior visiting research fellow at Green Templeton College, Oxford University, and an Honorary Doctor of Laws at the Institute of Business Administration, University of Karachi, where he had received his MBA.
